verses.verse: Let <S%G3745>all<s%> <S%G3745>who<s%> are <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G2218>yoke<s%> as <S%G1401>slaves<s%> <S%G2233>regard<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1203>masters<s%> as <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and [our] <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> may not be <S%G987>spoken<s%> <S%G987>against.<s%>

And let <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4103>believers<s%> as their <S%G1203>masters<s%> not be <S%G2706>disrespectful<s%> to them <S%G3754>because<s%> they are <S%G80>brethren,<s%> but let them <S%G1398>serve<s%> them <S%G3123>all<s%> the <S%G3123>more,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G482>partake<s%> of the <S%G2108>benefit<s%> are <S%G4103>believers<s%> and <S%G27>beloved.<s%> <S%G1321>Teach<s%> and <S%G3870>preach<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> [principles.]

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G2085>advocates<s%> a <S%G2085>different<s%> <S%G2085>doctrine,<s%> and does not <S%G4334>agree<s%> with <S%G5198>sound<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and with the <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> <S%G2596>conforming<s%> to <S%G2150>godliness,<s%>

he is <S%G5187>conceited<s%> [and] <S%G1987>understands<s%> <S%G3367>nothing;<s%> but he <S%G3552>has<s%> a <S%G3552>morbid<s%> <S%G3552>interest<s%> in <S%G2214>controversial<s%> <S%G2214>questions<s%> and <S%G3055>disputes<s%> <S%G3055>about<s%> <S%G3055>words,<s%> out of <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1096>arise<s%> <S%G5355>envy,<s%> <S%G2054>strife,<s%> <S%G988>abusive<s%> <S%G988>language,<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G5283>suspicions,<s%>

and <S%G1275>constant<s%> <S%G1275>friction<s%> between <S%G444>men<s%> of <S%G1311>depraved<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%> and <S%G650>deprived<s%> of the <S%G225>truth,<s%> who <S%G3543>suppose<s%> that <S%G2150>godliness<s%> is a <S%G4200>means<s%> of <S%G4200>gain.<s%>
But <S%G2150>godliness<s%> [actually] is a <S%G4200>means<s%> of <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4200>gain,<s%> when <S%G3326>accompanied<s%> by <S%G841>contentment.<s%>

For we have <S%G1533>brought<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> into the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G3754>so<s%> we <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3761><s%> <S%G1627>take<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%> out of it <S%G3761>either.<s%>
And if we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1305>food<s%> and <S%G4629>covering,<s%> with <S%G3778>these<s%> we shall be <S%G714>content.<s%>

But <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1014>want<s%> to <S%G4147>get<s%> <S%G4147>rich<s%> <S%G1706>fall<s%> into <S%G3986>temptation<s%> and a <S%G3803>snare<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G453>foolish<s%> and <S%G983>harmful<s%> <S%G1939>desires<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1036>plunge<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> into <S%G3639>ruin<s%> and <S%G684>destruction.<s%>

For the <S%G5365>love<s%> of <S%G5365>money<s%> is a <S%G4491>root<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> sorts of <S%G2556>evil,<s%> and <S%G5100>some<s%> by <S%G3713>longing<s%> for it have <S%G635>wandered<s%> <S%G635>away<s%> from the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and <S%G4044>pierced<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> with <S%G4183>many<s%> a <S%G3601>pang.<s%>

But <S%G5343>flee<s%> from <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> you <S%G444>man<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> and <S%G1377>pursue<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> <S%G2150>godliness,<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G5281>perseverance<s%> [and] <S%G4239>gentleness.<s%>

<S%G75>Fight<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G73>fight<s%> of <S%G4102>faith;<s%> <S%G1949>take<s%> <S%G1949>hold<s%> of the <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> to <S%G3739>which<s%> you were <S%G2564>called,<s%> and you <S%G3670>made<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3671>confession<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses.<s%>

I <S%G3853>charge<s%> you in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G2225>gives<s%> <S%G2225>life<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things,<s%> and of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> who <S%G3140>testified<s%> the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3671>confession<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G4194>Pontius<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%>

that you <S%G5083>keep<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G784>without<s%> <S%G423><s%> <S%G784>stain<s%> or <S%G423>reproach<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> the <S%G2015>appearing<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>

<S%G3739>which<s%> He will <S%G1166>bring<s%> about at the <S%G2398>proper<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> – He who is the <S%G3107>blessed<s%> and <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G1413>Sovereign,<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G936>kings<s%> and <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G2961>lords;<s%>

who <S%G3441>alone<s%> <S%G2192>possesses<s%> <S%G110>immortality<s%> and <S%G3611>dwells<s%> in <S%G676>unapproachable<s%> <S%G5457>light;<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> has <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G3761>or<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3708>see.<s%> To Him [be] <S%G5092>honor<s%> and <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2904>dominion!<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

<S%G3853>Instruct<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G4145>rich<s%> in <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G165>world<s%> not to be <S%G5309>conceited<s%> <S%G3366>or<s%> to <S%G1679>fix<s%> their <S%G1679>hope<s%> on the <S%G83>uncertainty<s%> of <S%G4149>riches,<s%> but on <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G4146>richly<s%> <S%G3930>supplies<s%> us with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> to <S%G619>enjoy.<s%>
[Instruct them] to <S%G14>do<s%> <S%G14>good,<s%> to be <S%G4147>rich<s%> in <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> to be <S%G2130>generous<s%> and <S%G2843>ready<s%> to <S%G2843>share,<s%>

<S%G597>storing<s%> up for <S%G1438>themselves<s%> the <S%G597>treasure<s%> of a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2310>foundation<s%> for the <S%G3195>future,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that they may <S%G1949>take<s%> <S%G1949>hold<s%> of that which is <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G3689>indeed.<s%>

<S%G5599>O<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy,<s%> <S%G5442>guard<s%> <S%G3866>what<s%> has been <S%G3866>entrusted<s%> to you, <S%G1624>avoiding<s%> <S%G952>worldly<s%> [and] <S%G2757>empty<s%> <S%G2757>chatter<s%> [and] the <S%G477>opposing<s%> <S%G477>arguments<s%> of <S%G5581>what<s%> is <S%G5581>falsely<s%> <S%G5581>called<s%> <S%G1108>"knowledge<s%>" –
